name: kintai-attendance-system
description: Attendance management system with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf public/* && cp -r frontend/dist/* public/ && chmod -R 755 public
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sudo systemctl reload nginx && npm run restart:pm2
